#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll getsum(ll n)
{
    ll S=0,r;
    while(n)
    {
        r = n%10;
        if(r%2)
            S+=r;
        else
            S+=2*r;
        n/=10;
    }
    return S%10;
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    ll t; cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll a,b,ans=0; cin >> a >> b;
        if(b-a <15)
        {
            for(ll i=a;i<=b;i++)
            {
                ans += getsum(i);
            }
            cout << ans << endl;
            continue;
        }
        if(a%10)
            ans = 45*(b/10-a/10-1);
        else
            ans = 45*(b/10-a/10);
        while(a%10)
        {
           // cout << "a : " << a <<" getsum : " << getsum(a) << endl;

            ans+=getsum(a);
            a++;
        }
        while(b%10)
        {//cout << "b : " << b <<" getsum : " << getsum(b) << endl;
            ans+=getsum(b);
            b--;
        }
        ans += getsum(b);
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
